message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exclusive product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $9,000?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice.  How about we settle at $9,750?
I can see you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $10,000?
